SELECT * FROM ( SELECT tor.`ORDERID`,tor.`ORDERNUM`,tor.`TOTALPRICE`,tor.`PAYSTATUS`,tip.`PROJECTNAME` AS ITEMNAME , tip.`HOMEIMG` AS ITEMLOGO,tp.`PRODUCTID`,tp.`PROTOCOLURL`,tbu.`USERNAME` AS sellerName,tor.`CREATETIME`,0 AS dealType FROM `T_ORDER_USER` tu LEFT JOIN `T_ORDER` tor ON tor.`ORDERID` = tu.`ORDERID` LEFT JOIN `T_ORDER_PRODUCT` tp ON tp.`ORDERID` = tor.`ORDERID` LEFT JOIN `T_INTELLECTUAL_PROJECT` tip ON tip.`ID` = tp.`PRODUCTID` LEFT JOIN `T_BHW_USER` tbu ON tbu.`ID` = tip.`USERID` WHERE tu.`USERID`=#{userOrderVo.userId} AND tor.`PAYSTATUS`=2 UNION ALL SELECT t.`ORDERID`,t.`ORDERNUM`,t.`TOTALPRICE`,t.`PAYSTATUS`,'' AS ITEMNAME ,'' AS ITEMLOGO,'','','官方' AS sellerName, t.CREATETIME,t.dealType FROM T_WALLET_ORDER t WHERE t.userid=#{userOrderVo.userId} AND t.`PAYSTATUS`=2 ) af where 1=1
and af.`ORDERID` like concat('%',#{userOrderVo.orderId},'%')
and af.`ORDERNUM` like concat('%',#{userOrderVo.orderNum},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT( af.`CREATETIME`, '%Y-%m-%d' ) BETWEEN #{userOrderVo.createTime} AND #{userOrderVo.updateTime}
ORDER BY af.CREATETIME DESC

SELECT t.*,tbu.`USERNAME` AS buyerName,(SELECT MAX(TOTALPRICE) FROM T_WALLET_ORDER WHERE `DEALTYPE`=3 ) AS vipType FROM T_WALLET_ORDER t LEFT JOIN T_BHW_USER tbu ON tbu.`ID` = t.`USERID` WHERE 1=1
and t.`DEALTYPE` = #{userOrderVo.dealType}
and t.`TOTALPRICE` = #{userOrderVo.vipType}
and t.`ORDERID` like concat('%',#{userOrderVo.orderId},'%')
and t.`ORDERNUM` like concat('%',#{userOrderVo.orderNum},'%')
and t.CREATETIME >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order by t.CREATETIME desc

SELECT SUM(tor.`TOTALPRICE`) AS totalPrice,GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(tor.`ORDERID`)) AS orderId FROM `T_ORDER` tor LEFT JOIN `T_ORDER_USER` tou ON tou.`ORDERID` = tor.`ORDERID` LEFT JOIN `T_BHW_USER` tbu ON tbu.`ID` = tou.`USERID` LEFT JOIN `T_ORDER_PRODUCT` top ON tor.`ORDERID` = top.`ORDERID` LEFT JOIN `T_INTELLECTUAL_PROJECT` tnp ON top.`PRODUCTID` = tnp.`ID` WHERE tnp.`USERID` = #{userOrderVo.userId} AND tor.`STATUS`=#{userOrderVo.status}
AND tor.`CLOSESTATUS`= #{userOrderVo.payStatus}
